alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 2:59PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Southwest Winds This Afternoon... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph. Locally higher gusts to 65 mph across the south side of Casper. * WHERE...Natrona County. * WHEN...Through 9 PM today, wind should begin to decrease after sunset. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers especially along Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind will blow around loose objects. Motorists should prepare for sudden strong gusts if traveling these roads.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
